title: cmd/gc: removing println statement triggers "nosplit stack overflow"
body:
by **dhwellsjr**: 
// Ubuntu(12.04)/amd64
// go version devel +4fa98cce4290 Mon Oct 29 11:16:58 2012 -0400

Run attached with line 25 (println(...)) commented or not.

Commented the code triggers "Nosplit stack overflow."

Not commented the code will execute and end with no error.
Attachments: 1. shortParens.go (447 bytes)
